resources.string: It was created for to please you :) Here you can create a greeting card. There are a few available images, a simple editor, enter text and send it by email.

On the main page, select the image. Five different masks can be selected from the six images. To select, click on the image. In the second box from the top is the saturation slider, set it to the desired value and apply the mask (click on the button from the bottom of the proposed options, if the effect was not sufficiently complete, press again). To cancel all the changes, click on the arrow on the left. To send, click on the right button. In the third window, you can write a subject and message, and send it by email.
